<[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-assure-vdi-performance?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp-overcome-vdi-challenges&utm_content=01042017]]> HiÂ {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Virtual Desktop Infrastructure (VDI) holds great promise for end-user computing teams to centralize management and maintenance, lower operational costs, improve security and deliver flexibility to mobile workers. But did you know that 46% of VDI projects stall due to cost and performance issues? This fact emphasizes the need for an autonomic platform that delivers a desktop experience to end-users. The paper below explores some of the common challenges facing VDI planning, deployment and operations and how to avoid these costly challenges. <[[https://turbonomic.com/thx-wp-assure-vdi-performance?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=wp-overcome-vdi-challenges&utm_content=01042017]]>
